title.narrative: Advocacy activities by sub-grantees in Benue and Zamfara States

description.narrative: The organizations that benefited from the sub-grants in Benue and Zamfara States which received funding in quarter 2 of 2018 carried out the following activities during this reporting period: 1.1 Stakeholders’ engagement 1.1.1 Advocacy Visits to relevant Government institutions in the Benue and Zamfara states. 1.1.2 Advocacy visits to respective LGAs & selected Communities. (The communities were selected based on communities that are marginalized of social services that affect women, children and vulnerable community members). 1.2 Interactive meetings on rural women’s priorities Read full report of activities on the following link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1m27YQlxs-k8Z-IOVHwGoNml-zl_yI3wv

activity-date.narrative: This advocacy activities were implemented between July and September 2018. Different organizations started on different dates. The activities continue in the next quarter

recipient-country.narrative: These activities are being implemented in Benue and Zamfara States in Nigeria

sector.narrative: The aim of these activities is to ensure gender equality in Benue and Zamfara States
